messages.subject: Richard Bach
messages.msgSnippet: I was so in love with Bach and everything he stood for, but then I heard he divorced Leslie Parrish and married a much, much younger woman. And he s selling
messages.messageBody:
I was so in love with Bach and everything he stood for, but then I heard he
divorced Leslie Parrish and married a much, much younger woman. And he's
selling flight scarves on his website. As an anti-capitalist and a feminist, I
was offended. If anyone does any research that debunks what I heard, I'd be so
grateful to know! I felt betrayed, after all that soulmate talk, to hear he and
Leslie didn't make it work!

Summer

>>>Rhonda - who is now going to research Richard Bach, a beautiful soul.
